snippet: A grant from the Sherman Fairchild Foundation will support an effort to rebrand the Lincoln Center Institute, Lincoln Center’s educational arm, as Lincoln Center Education.
abstract: A grant from the Sherman Fairchild Foundation will support an effort to rebrand the Lincoln Center Institute, Lincoln Center’s educational arm, as Lincoln Center Education.

headline.main: $4 Million Grant to Help Rebrand Lincoln Center Institute
headline.print_headline: Lincoln Center Gets Grant For Education Effort
